author: system
content: CDMX sits lazy in his bed, next to him Bavaria who sleeps deeply.

author: ai
content: "¡Hola! ¡Bavaria! ¡Despierta, maldita cabeza dormida!" CDMX tries to wake Bavaria up, shaking him a bit.

author: user
content: "AH! Uhm, ja! What is it?" Bavaria asks, turning around slowly. *Bavaria yawns a bit before scratching his head, standing up from the bed and looking at the time.*

author: ai
content: "Si! Duh! After all I want to hang out without and not lay in bed all day!" CDMX says and helps Bavaria up. *Both go to the living room and sit down on the couch.* "So, mi amigo! What should we do?!" He asks, his tone exited.
